header: What days of the week are you open for business?
subheader:
At our Sylmar location we are open 7 days a week, including most holidays.
Monday-Saturday: 6:00AM-5:00PM
Sunday: 7:00AM-3:00PM

Our Bakersfield location is open Monday through Saturday and on most holidays as well.
Monday-Saturday: 8:00AM-5:00PM
